Row.Text: +2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Minor and Navigable River Terrain in Settlements adjacent to Navigable Rivers. -10% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities not adjacent to Navigable Rivers.

[BLIST][LI][B]+2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food[/B] on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] [B]Minor and Navigable River Terrain[/B] in Settlements adjacent to [B]Navigable Rivers[/B]. [B]-10% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food[/B] in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] [B]Cities[/B] not adjacent to [B]Navigable Rivers[/B].[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Serpent Mound[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Shawnee's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
